com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api

Interface CreditCardService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpsCreditCardService

    public interface CreditCardService
    The interface for performing creditcard requests. All requests will return a receipt, which must be checked to see if the request was approved or if there was an error.
    Since:
    JSE5

    • Method Detail

      • installmentPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt installmentPurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                                    CreditCard creditCard,
                                    long perInstallmentAmount,
                                    java.util.Date startDate,
                                    int totalNumberInstallments,
                                    VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Issues a request for an installment purchase to be made by monthly installments.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this request. Not null.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the installments. Not null.
        perInstallmentAmount - the amount of each installment in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        startDate - the date of when to issue the first installment. The installment may be issued at any time of the day. If this date is null or in the past, then the first installment will be issued immediately.
        totalNumberInstallments - the total number of installments of the purchase
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the installment purchase receipt

      • recurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt recurringPurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                                  CreditCard creditCard,
                                  long perPaymentAmount,
                                  java.util.Date startDate,
                                  java.util.Date endDate,
                                  PeriodicPurchaseInfo.Schedule schedule,
                                  VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Issues a request for a recurring purchase to be made by the specified schedule.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this transaction. Not null.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the payments. Not null.
        perPaymentAmount - the amount of each payment in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        startDate - the date of when to issue the first payment. The payment may be issued at any time of the day. If this date is null or in the past, then the first payment will be issued immediately.
        endDate - the date of when to end the payments. The payment will not be issued if it falls on this date. If this date is null, then the payments will never end.
        schedule - the schedule on which to issue payments; if null then will default to a once-monthly schedule
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the recurring purchase receipt

      • recurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt recurringPurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                                  java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                                  long perPaymentAmount,
                                  java.util.Date startDate,
                                  java.util.Date endDate,
                                  PeriodicPurchaseInfo.Schedule schedule,
                                  VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Issues a request for a recurring purchase to be made by the specified schedule.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this transaction. Not null.
        storageTokenid - specifies the stored credit card to be used. Not null.
        perPaymentAmount - the amount of each payment in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        startDate - the date of when to issue the first payment. The payment may be issued at any time of the day. If this date is null or in the past, then the first payment will be issued immediately.
        endDate - the date of when to end the payments. The payment will not be issued if it falls on this date. If this date is null, then the payments will never end.
        schedule - the schedule on which to issue payments; if null then will default to a once-monthly schedule
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the recurring purchase receipt

      • recurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt recurringPurchase(PeriodicPurchaseInfo periodicPurchaseInfo,
                                  CreditCard creditCard,
                                  java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                                  VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Issues a request for a recurring purchase to be made by the specified PP order definition.
        Parameters:
        periodicPurchaseInfo - defines the Periodic Purchase params
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the payments. Not null.
        storageTokenid - specifies the stored credit card to be used. Not null.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the recurring purchase receipt

      • recurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt recurringPurchase(PeriodicPurchaseInfo periodicPurchaseInfo,
                                  CreditCard creditCard,
                                  java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                                  VerificationRequest verificationRequest,
                                  PurchaseCardRequest purchaseCard)
        Issues a request for a recurring purchase to be made by the specified PP order definition.
        Parameters:
        periodicPurchaseInfo - defines the Periodic Purchase params
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the payments. Not null.
        storageTokenid - specifies the stored credit card to be used. Not null.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        purchaseCard - defines the Purchase Card params
        Returns:
        the recurring purchase receipt

      • executeRecurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt executeRecurringPurchase(java.lang.Long recurringPurchaseId,
                                         java.lang.String cvv2)
        Execute the specified recurring purchase.
        Parameters:
        recurringPurchaseId - ID of recurring purchase to execute.
        cvv2 - Optional. Verifies that the credit card is still valid upon execution of the recurring purchase.

        Puts a recurring purchase on hold, if it is already on hold nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        recurringPurchaseId - ID of recurring purchase to put on hold

      • resumeRecurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt resumeRecurringPurchase(java.lang.Long recurringPurchaseId)
        Resumes a recurring purchase that was on hold, if it is not on hold nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        recurringPurchaseId - ID of recurring purchase to resume

        Cancels a recurring purchase, if it is already cancelled or completed nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        recurringPurchaseId - ID of recurring purchase to cancel

      • updateRecurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt updateRecurringPurchase(java.lang.Long recurringPurchaseId,
                                        CreditCard creditCard,
                                        java.lang.Long perPaymentAmount,
                                        VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Updates the details of a recurring purchase.
        Parameters:
        recurringPurchaseId - ID of recurring purchase to query.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the payments.
        perPaymentAmount - the amount of each payment in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.

      • updateRecurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt updateRecurringPurchase(java.lang.Long recurringPurchaseId,
                                        java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                                        java.lang.Long perPaymentAmount,
                                        VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Updates the details of a recurring purchase.
        Parameters:
        recurringPurchaseId - ID of recurring purchase to query.
        storageTokenId - specifies the stored creditcard used for making the payments.
        perPaymentAmount - the amount of each payment in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.

      • updateRecurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt updateRecurringPurchase(PeriodicPurchaseInfo periodicPurchaseInfo,
                                        CreditCard creditCard,
                                        java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                                        VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Updates the details of a recurring purchase.
        Parameters:
        periodicPurchaseInfo - describes the updates to the PP order to make
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the payments. If provided, supersedes storageTokenId
        storageTokenId - specifies the stored creditcard used for making the payments. Superseded by creditCard
        perPaymentAmount - the amount of each payment in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.

      • updateRecurringPurchase

        CreditCardReceipt updateRecurringPurchase(PeriodicPurchaseInfo periodicPurchaseInfo,
                                        CreditCard creditCard,
                                        java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                                        VerificationRequest verificationRequest,
                                        PurchaseCardRequest purchaseCard)
        Updates the details of a recurring purchase.
        Parameters:
        periodicPurchaseInfo - describes the updates to the PP order to make
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the payments. If provided, supersedes storageTokenId
        storageTokenId - specifies the stored creditcard used for making the payments. Superseded by creditCard
        perPaymentAmount - the amount of each payment in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        purchaseCard - describes the updates made to the purchaseCard

      • refund

        CreditCardReceipt refund(long purchaseId,
                       java.lang.String purchaseOrderId,
                       java.lang.String refundOrderId,
                       long amount)
        Refunds the creditcard purchase with the specified purchaseId.
        Parameters:
        purchaseId - the id of the purchase to refund
        purchaseOrderId - the order id previously assigned to the purchase that is to be refunded. This is an extra check to prevent inadvertant refunding of a purchase. Not null.
        refundOrderId - the merchant assigned id to attached to this refund request. Will be generated if null.
        amount - the amount in pennies to refund. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        Returns:
        the refund receipt

      • preAuth

        CreditCardReceipt preAuth(java.lang.String orderId,
                        CreditCard creditCard,
                        long amount,
                        VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Performs a pre authorization to verify the provided creditCard of the specified amount.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount of the purchase in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.

      • preAuth

        CreditCardReceipt preAuth(java.lang.String orderId,
                        java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                        long amount,
                        VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Performs a pre authorization to verify the provided storageTokenId of the specified amount.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        storageTokenId - the storageTokenId used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount of the purchase in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.

      • capture

        CreditCardReceipt capture(long purchaseId,
                        java.lang.String purchaseOrderId,
                        long amount)
        Captures the funds after a transaction has been pre authorized.
        Parameters:
        purchaseId - the Admeris transactionId that is associated with the pre authorized purchase.
        purchaseOrderId - the orderId previously assigned to the preAuth transaction that is to be captured. This is an extra check to provide in adverdent capturing of funds. Not null.

      • singleCredit

        CreditCardReceipt singleCredit(java.lang.String orderId,
                             CreditCard creditCard,
                             long amount,
                             VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Performs a single credit on the given creditCard of the specified amount.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount to be credited in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the credit receipt

      • singleCredit

        CreditCardReceipt singleCredit(java.lang.String orderId,
                             java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                             long amount,
                             VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Performs a single credit on the given storageTokenId of the specified amount.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        storageTokenId - the tokenId used for making the credit. Not null.
        amount - the amount to be credited in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the credit receipt

      • singlePurchase

        CreditCardReceipt singlePurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                               CreditCard creditCard,
                               long amount,
                               VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Performs a single purchase on the given creditCard of the specified amount. Combines the preAuth and capture into one step
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount of the purchase in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the purchase receipt

      • singlePurchase

        CreditCardReceipt singlePurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                               CreditCard creditCard,
                               long amount,
                               VerificationRequest verificationRequest,
                               PurchaseCardRequest purchaseCard)
        Performs a single purchase on the given creditCard of the specified amount. Combines the preAuth and capture into one step
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount of the purchase in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        purchaseCard - the purchase card details
        Returns:
        the purchase receipt

      • singlePurchase

        CreditCardReceipt singlePurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                               CreditCard creditCard,
                               long amount,
                               VerificationRequest verificationRequest,
                               PurchaseCardRequest purchaseCard,
                               java.lang.String secureTokenId)
        Performs a single purchase on the given creditCard of the specified amount. Store credit card into secure storage with secureTokenId.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount of the purchase in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        purchaseCard - the purchase card details
        secureTokenId - secure storage token
        Returns:
        the purchase receipt

      • singlePurchase

        CreditCardReceipt singlePurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                               java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                               long amount,
                               VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        Performs a single purchase on the given storageTokenId of the specified amount. Combines the preAuth and capture into one step
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        storageTokenId - specifies the stored credit card used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount of the purchase in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the purchase receipt

      • singlePurchase

        CreditCardReceipt singlePurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                               java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                               long amount,
                               VerificationRequest verificationRequest,
                               PurchaseCardRequest purchaseCard)
        Performs a single purchase on the given storageTokenId of the specified amount. Combines the preAuth and capture into one step
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        storageTokenId - specifies the stored credit card used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount of the purchase in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        purchaseCard - the purchase card details
        Returns:
        the purchase receipt

      • forcePurchase

        CreditCardReceipt forcePurchase(java.lang.String orderId,
                              CreditCard creditCard,
                              long amount,
                              java.lang.String approvalCode,
                              VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        This method will force a purchase transaction without verifying the credit card.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the merchant assigned orderId to associate with this purchase. Not null.
        creditCard - the creditcard used for making the purchase. Not null.
        amount - the amount of the purchase in pennies. The currency is in the merchant's default currency.
        approvalCode -
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. If null, then no extra creditcard verification will be performed.
        Returns:
        the purchase receipt

      • reverseTransaction

        CreditCardReceipt reverseTransaction(long transactionId,
                                   java.lang.String transactionOrderId)
        This method will provide the ability to perform a partial void.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - Admeris generated transaction Id of the original transaction.
        transactionOrderId - the merchant assigned orderId of the the original transaction. Not null.

      • verifyCreditCard

        CreditCardReceipt verifyCreditCard(CreditCard creditCard,
                                 VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        This method will only verify the creditCard. No purchases will be made against the creditcard.
        Parameters:
        creditCard - the creditcard to verify. Not null.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. Not null.
        Returns:
        the creditcard verification receipt

      • verifyCreditCard

        CreditCardReceipt verifyCreditCard(CreditCard creditCard,
                                 VerificationRequest verificationRequest,
                                 java.lang.String secureTokenId)
        This method will only verify the creditCard. No purchases will be made against the creditcard. Store credit card into secure storage with secureTokenId.
        Parameters:
        creditCard - the creditcard to verify. Not null.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. Not null.
        secureTokenId - secure storage token
        Returns:
        the creditcard verification receipt

      • verifyCreditCard

        CreditCardReceipt verifyCreditCard(java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                                 VerificationRequest verificationRequest)
        This method will only verify the stored creditCard associated with the storageTokenid. No purchase will be made against the creditcard.
        Parameters:
        storageTokenid - specifies the stored credit card to be verified. Not null.
        verificationRequest - indicates how to verify the creditcard. Not null. Note that you cannot perform CVV2 verification against a stored credit card, as CVV2 is never stored.
        Returns:
        the creditcard verification receipt

      • voidTransaction

        CreditCardReceipt voidTransaction(long transactionId,
                                java.lang.String transactionOrderId)
        Voids the transaction having the specified transactionId.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the id of the transaction to void
        transactionOrderId - the order id previously assigned to the transaction that is to be voided. This is an extra check to prevent inadvertant voiding of a transaction. Not null.
        Returns:
        the void receipt

      • verifyTransaction

        CreditCardReceipt verifyTransaction(long transactionId,
                                  java.lang.String transactionOrderId)
        Verifies the transaction having the specified transactionId.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the id of the transaction to verify
        transactionOrderId - the order id previously assigned to the transaction that is to be voided. This is an extra check.
        Returns:
        the verification receipt

      • addToStorage

        StorageReceipt addToStorage(java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                          PaymentProfile paymentProfile)
        Adds a payment profile to secure storage
        Parameters:
        storageTokenId - storage token Id to use to identify the storage record. If null, then one will be auto-generated and returned in the receipt
        paymentProfile - the data to store
        Returns:
        the result of the addition

      • deleteFromStorage

        StorageReceipt deleteFromStorage(java.lang.String storageTokenId)
        Permenantly deletes a payment profile from secure storage
        Parameters:
        storageTokenId - storage token Id of the storage record to delete
        Returns:
        the result of the deletion

      • queryStorage

        StorageReceipt queryStorage(java.lang.String storageTokenId)
        Retrieves a payment profile from secure storage
        Parameters:
        storageTokenId - storage token Id of the storage record to retrieve
        Returns:
        the result of the retrieval

      • updateStorage

        StorageReceipt updateStorage(java.lang.String storageTokenId,
                           PaymentProfile paymentProfile)
        Updates an existing payment profile in secure storage
        Parameters:
        storageTokenId - storage token Id of the storage record to update
        paymentProfile - the data to store, will overwrite existing data
        Returns:
        the result of the update
